name: github-api-open
description: Open the API page of a Github repository

scripts.build-local: node -r dotenv/config -r ts-node/register esbuild.ts --local && cp -r static/* out-local
scripts.watch-local: mkdir -p out-local && cp -r static/* out-local && node -r dotenv/config -r ts-node/register esbuild.ts --local --watch
scripts.build-prod: node -r dotenv/config -r ts-node/register esbuild.ts --prod && cp -r static/* out-prod
scripts.watch-prod: mkdir -p out-prod && cp -r static/* out-prod && node -r dotenv/config -r ts-node/register esbuild.ts --prod --watch

author: Vivek Nair
